subject: Football

Scholarships and Fellowships
Football (College)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Ohio State University will reduce its football scholarships by five over three years as part of a self-imposed punishment in response to allegations about a booster’s misdeeds.
snippet: Ohio State University will reduce its football scholarships by five over three years as part of a self-imposed punishment in response to allegations about a booster’s misdeeds.
